tool_description: Monitors stock levels against predefined thresholds and generates alerts for low stock, out of stock, or overstock conditions with recommended actions.

product_ids.description: Product IDs to monitor for threshold violations

low_stock_threshold.description: Threshold below which to trigger low stock alerts

critical_stock_threshold.description: Critical stock level requiring immediate attention

overstock_threshold.description: Threshold above which to trigger overstock alerts

error_messages: Invalid product list: product_ids must contain 1-1000 valid product IDs
Invalid threshold values: Thresholds must be non-negative integers with critical < low < overstock
Products not found: Some product IDs do not exist in the inventory system
Monitoring service unavailable: Unable to access current stock levels for monitoring
usage: Provide an array of product_ids to monitor and optionally set threshold values. The tool will check current stock levels against thresholds and return alerts and recommendations.

alerts.description: Array of alert messages for threshold violations

low_stock_products.description: Product IDs below low stock threshold

critical_stock_products.description: Product IDs at critical stock levels

out_of_stock_products.description: Product IDs that are completely out of stock

recommendations.description: Recommended actions for each threshold violation
